verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Take a look at the mountain,
stretching a mile high.
Take a look at the ocean,
far as your eye can see,
And think of Me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Take a look at the desert.
Do you feel like a grain of sand?
I am with you wherever;
where you go is where I am.

verse.name: p1
c1
verse.lines:
I love you more than the sun
And the stars that I taught how to shine.
You are Mine, and you shine for Me too.
I love you yesterday and today and tomorrow;
I'll say it again and again:
I love you more.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Just a face in the city,
just a tear on a crowded street.
But you are one in a million,
and you belong to Me.

verse.name: p2
verse.lines:
And I want you to know
that I'm not letting go,
Even when you come undone.

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Shine for Me. You shine for Me.
You shine on. You shine on. You shine for Me.

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
I love you more than the sun
And the stars that I taught how to shine.
You are mine, and you shine for me too.
I love you yesterday and today and tomorrow;
I'll say it again and again:
I love you more than the sun
And the stars that I taught how to shine.
You are mine, and you shine for me too.
I love you yesterday and today, through the joy and the pain,
I'll say it again and again:

verse.name: b2
verse.lines:
I love you more.
I love you more.
And I see you, and I made you,
And I love you more than you can imagine,
More than you can fathom.
I love you more than the sun,
and you shine for Me.
